clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in bone marrow transplant and graft versus host disease

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Rimiducis is used to activate inducible caspase 9 produced by a modified gene included in some CAR T cell therapies A192849 A192852 This activation produces rapid induction of apoptosis in activated modified T cells and resolution of the signs and symptoms of graft versus host disease within 24 hours A192855
